channel.title: Getting files
channel.description: Hi I was just curious how to get the files for a game such as runescape, maplestory, adventure quest, dragon fable, perfect world. How would you get the files to change the setings to play offlien and make a private server. mroe or less i just am curious how you get the files.

item.title: Getting files
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

are you fuckign retarted i know that jesus christ I know that you have to make the files in a program such as vs c++ 2010 and make 3d imaging in programs such as blender. jesus fucking christ listen to what the hell i am saying. " How did we get the files? " is that so hard to understand holy shit.

item.description:

aces610:

no i know but what i am asking is how did they get the files. i have made servers before well player with them.

The RuneScape Developers Made the RuneScape files, such as we do with RSPS’s.

item.title: Getting files
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

You certainly cannot get the exact files of any of those games unless you know a developer who would give you them : sarcasm: To make an RSPS you go into the ‘server download’ topic and download a simple/cleaned base+client and start working on it… ‘server download topic’= www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

Read full topic
